name: Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita
description: Replaces the Code of Criminal Procedure (CrPC)

sections.title: Information in cognizable cases
sections.description: Procedure for recording First Information Report (FIR)
procedure: Police shall reduce the information into writing
Information shall be read over to the informant
Every such information shall be signed by the informant
sections.notes: Can be filed at any police station regardless of jurisdiction
